NETWORK_DISCONNECT_STEAM_INUSE: STEAM UserID is already in use on this server.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_STEAM_AUTHCANCELLED: Steam authorization failed. Connection to server denied by Steam.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_STEAM_AUTHALREADYUSED: Steam authorization failed. Connection to server denied by Steam.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_STEAM_AUTHINVALID: Steam authorization failed. Connection to server denied by Steam.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_STEAM_LOGGED_IN_ELSEW: This Steam account is being used in another location.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_STEAM_VAC_CHECK_TIMED: Valve Anti-Cheat challenge timed out. Please ensure that you are not using any programs that may interfere with VAC, and confirm that Steam is correctly installed.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_STEAM_DROPPED: Steam authorization failed. You must be connected to Steam to make the initial connection to the game server.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_STEAM_OWNERSHIP: This Steam account does not own this game. Please login to the correct Steam account.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_TICKMSG_OVERFLOW: Server failed to write client tick message.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_STRINGTABLEMSG_OVERFL: Error writing string table update message.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_DELTAENTMSG_OVERFLOW: Too many entities on the server.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_TEMPENTMSG_OVERFLOW: Too many temporary entities on the server.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_BADDELTATICK: Client delta ticks out of order.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_TIMEDOUT: Unable to establish a connection with the gameserver.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_DISCONNECTED: Disconnected. The console might have more details.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_HLTVRESTRICTED: SourceTV server is restricted to local spectators (class C).
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_HLTVDIRECT: SourceTV cannot connect to the game directly.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_PURESERVER_CLIENTEXTR: Pure server: client has loaded extra file(s).
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_PURESERVER_MISMATCH:
Pure server: client file does not match server.

https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8285-YOAZ-6049
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_DIRECT_CONNECT_RESERV: Reservation cannot connect to the game directly.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_CLIENT_NO_MAP: Required map is missing on your client.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_CLIENT_DIFFERENT_MAP: Your map version differs from the server.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_SERVER_REQUIRES_STEAM: Client and server must be connected to Steam.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_STEAM_DENY_MISC: Connection to server denied by Steam.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_STEAM_DENY_BAD_ANTI_C: Connection to server denied by VAC.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_SERVER_SHUTDOWN: Disconnected from gameserver. The gameserver is shutting down.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_CONNECT_REQUEST_TIMED: Unable to establish a connection with the gameserver.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_LOCALPROBLEM_MANYRELA: Lost connection, even after trying several relays in different geographic locations. The most likely cause is a problem with your Internet connection.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_LOCALPROBLEM_HOSTEDSE: Gameserver has lost connectivity with the primary relay the client was using.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_LOCALPROBLEM_NETWORKC: Check your Internet connection. Unable to download the network configuration from CDN.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_LOCALPROBLEM_OTHER: Disconnected. It looks like there may be a problem with your Internet connection.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REMOTE_TIMEOUT: The game stopped receiving communications from the remote host.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REMOTE_TIMEOUT_CONNEC: After several attempts to connect, the server did not respond.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REMOTE_OTHER: Problem communicating with the remote host.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REMOTE_BADCRYPT: The remote host presented a bad certificate or is misconfigured.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REMOTE_CERTNOTTRUSTED: The remote host presented a certificate that could not be used for authentication.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_UNUSUAL: Disconnected. The console might have more details.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_INTERNAL_ERROR: Disconnected due to an internal error. The console might have more details.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REJECT_BADCHALLENGE: Bad challenge packet rejected by server.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REJECT_NOLOBBY: Server is not hosting a game lobby.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REJECT_BACKGROUND_MAP: Server is running a background map.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REJECT_SINGLE_PLAYER: Server is running a single player game.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REJECT_HIDDEN_GAME: Server is running a hidden game.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REJECT_LANRESTRICT: Server is restricted to LAN games only.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REJECT_FAILEDCHANNEL: Bad network channel rejected by server.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REJECT_CONNECT_FROM_L: Server requires clients to connect from a game lobby.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REJECT_RESERVED_FOR_L: Server is reserved for a game lobby.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REJECT_OLDPROTOCOL: Your client is out of date.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REJECT_INVALIDCERTLEN: Invalid client certificate rejected by server.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REJECT_INVALIDSTEAMCE: Invalid Steam certificate rejected by server.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REJECT_STEAM: Steam rejected your connection to server.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REJECT_SERVERCDKEYAUT: CD key authentication rejected by server.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_REJECT_BANNED: Your client is not allowed to join this server.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_KICKED_TK_START: For killing a teammate at round start.
NETWORK_DISCONNECT_KICKED_TEAMHURTING: For doing too much team damage.
